description:

Shitty lighting, small space, smelly couch. This is the setting for a real Casting Couch session. Lady Kat is an owned slave who loves sex & orgasm. She has a killer body & loves to show it off & REALLY wants to be a porn star. We give her the chance to show us what she is made of both inside & out. She is a bit giddy from the start but if you members like her I will be sure to bring her back & wipe that smile off her face for you… Let me know what you think.
title: Amateur Casting Couch 15: Hot Weather, Hot Slut, Hot Orgasms
